name: Masnoon Duaen aur Azkaar - Arabic and Urdu Tarjuma
description: The app features Masnoon Duaen, Azkaar, Manzil, Namaz, Istikhara, Din aur Raat ki Sunnatien and many more.  App Features:  Beautiful User Interface Easy Navigation Customize-able Arabic Font and Font Size Customize-able Urdu Font and Font Size Light, Dark and many other Themes Go to Last Read Page Jump to Specific Page Share Dua Text Unlimited Bookmarks  Do read and benefit from this app insha Allah and help us spread the message of Islam to as many people as possible.  Also, do give your feedback about the app.  Jazk Allhu Khayran
